description: This PHP source file handles AJAX requests to set or retrieve user-related status information such as battery level, internet connectivity, Wi-Fi status, and security/firewall status. It includes session management, retrieves system status via external functions, and outputs a JSON-encoded configuration object.

methods.name: get_tips
methods.description: Generates informational tips based on the target status and value (e.g., connection status, device counts, firewall level).
